channel.title: Logos on InfluxData Branding Docs
channel.description: Recent content in Logos on InfluxData Branding Docs

item.title: Downloads
item.description: Downloads DOs Use appropriate margin around the logo to let it breathe The Symbol can be used by itself Make sure the logo has appropriate contrast with the background If placing the logo over an image, make sure the area underneath is not busy If placing the logo over a busy image, darken or lighten the image using brand colors to ensure proper contrast DON'Ts Do not use the Logotype without the Symbol Do not vertically stack the Logotype & Symbol without special permission Do not add any effects to the logo or symbol (such as drop shadow, glow, etc.

item.title: Logo Usage Guidelines
item.description: Logo Usage Guidelines DOs Use appropriate margin around the logo to let it breathe The Symbol can be used by itself Make sure the logo has appropriate contrast with the background If placing the logo over an image, make sure the area underneath is not busy If placing the logo over a busy image, darken or lighten the image using brand colors to ensure proper contrast DON'Ts Do not use the Logotype without the Symbol Do not vertically stack the Logotype & Symbol without special permission Do not add any effects to the logo or symbol (such as drop shadow, glow, etc.

item.title: Anatomy
item.description: Anatomy of The Logo Usage Rules Use appropriate margin around the logo to let it breathe The Symbol can be used by itself Do not use the Logotype without the Symbol Do not vertically stack the Logotype & Symbol The Symbol: Cuboctahedron Symbol + Logotype

item.title: Story
item.description: How The Cuboctahedron Came To Be: The Story Of Our Visual Journey From InfluxDB to InfluxData What began as InfluxDB will become InfluxData; going from product to platform. InfluxDB will become one of four products known collectively as the "TICK Stack". This transition of the company is the inception our efforts. Our goals:We want the logo to feel like a platform while maintaining its own unique identity.
